You've finally managed to discover the secret to immortality, and you're overjoyed. Suddenly, Death appears before you, hands you a business card, and says, "When you realize living forever sucks, call this number, I've got a job offer for you."

You're shocked and confused. You thought you had discovered the secret to immortality, and now Death is offering you a job? You try to think of a way to refuse, but you can't shake the feeling that something is off.

As you ponder, you realize that you've been living forever without ever experiencing the concept of death. You've never known what it's like to die, and now Death is offering you a chance to experience it.

You decide to call the number and accept the job offer. You've never felt so alive, and you can't wait to see what the future holds.

Over night, 90% of the world's population has dropped dead. In the following weeks, the survivors, who come from diverse countries, ethnicities, religious beliefs and lifestyles, realize that they all share a single, peculiar trait: they are all blind.

As they band together to survive, they begin to uncover the mystery of this sudden and catastrophic event. They discover that the mass blindness was caused by a mysterious virus that has spread across the globe, stripping anyone who contracts it of their sight.

As the survivors struggle to find a cure, they also realize that the virus is not just a random occurrence, but rather the result of a scientific experiment gone wrong. The survivors must now work together to uncover the source of the virus and find a way to stop it before it's too late.

In the end, the survivors must confront the consequences of the scientific experiment and decide whether to forgive or punish those responsible for the destruction that has been unleashed.

''
answers:
As I sat at the kitchen table, munching on my sandwich, the TV suddenly turned on by itself. I looked up, startled, and saw a message from the local weather warning system. The message was usually accompanied by a loud alarm, but this time, it was oddly silent. The message read, "For the safety and well-being of all local citizens, this warning will be broadcasted silently."

I felt a sense of unease wash over me. What did this mean? Why was the warning being broadcasted silently? I glanced around the room, but there was no one around. I decided to ignore the message and continue with my lunch, but I couldn't shake the feeling that something was off.

As I finished up my sandwich, I couldn't help but wonder what had caused the TV to turn on by itself and why the warning was being broadcasted silently. I couldn't shake the feeling that something was going to happen, and maybe soon.

results.prompt: [ WP ] A kid tries to talk the monster under the bed into attacking the monster in the closet .
answers:
Once upon a time, there was a young boy named Timmy who lived in a small town surrounded by dense forests. Timmy loved exploring the woods and discovering new things. One day, while wandering through the woods, Timmy stumbled upon an old, abandoned cabin. Curious, Timmy entered the cabin and discovered strange artifacts scattered throughout the rooms. Among these artifacts were two stone statues depicting mythical creatures—one depicting a monster under the bed and the other depicting a monster in the closet. Intrigued by these statues, Timmy decided to bring them home with him.

Upon returning home, Timmy placed the stone statues on his bedside table. As night fell, Timmy noticed something strange happening. The stone statues began to glow faintly, emitting an eerie hum. Suddenly, Timmy heard faint rustling sounds coming from under his bed and inside his closet simultaneously. Panic began to overwhelm Timmy as he realized that his stone statues had awakened their mythical counterparts—one lurking under his bed and the other lurking inside his closet.

results.prompt: [ WP ] You own a magical camera that is similar to a thermal camera , but instead of heat it shows you value . A ring glows as bright as the sun while a piece of plastic wrapping is almost invisible . You have been careful never to look at a person with it for your whole life .
answers:
One day, I was walking down the street when I saw a man with a shiny ring. I took out my camera and pointed it at the ring. It glowed as bright as the sun! The man looked surprised and scared. He quickly took the ring off and put it in his pocket.

I watched him as he walked away. He was trying to hide the ring, but my camera showed it all. I knew he was hiding something valuable. I followed him and saw him go into a store. I went inside and saw him wrapping a piece of plastic wrapping around the ring. The plastic wrapping was almost invisible to my camera.

I approached him and asked him what he was doing. He looked surprised and said, "I don't know what you're talking about." But I knew he was lying. I showed him the ring and the plastic wrapping with my camera. He looked shocked and embarrassed. He realized he had been hiding something valuable all this time.

Once upon a time, there lived a girl named Lily who owned a magical camera similar to a thermal camera. Unlike regular thermal cameras, hers showed the value of objects instead of heat. A ring would glow as bright as the sun while a piece of plastic wrapping was almost invisible. Lily had been careful never to look at a person with it for her whole life.

One day, Lily stumbled upon an old, dusty trunk in her attic. Curious, she opened it and discovered an ancient artifact adorned with intricate engravings. As she peered through her magical camera, Lily noticed that the artifact was radiating an unusual aura—one radiating positivity and another radiating negativity.
